mapper.select: select m_id, m_name , m_birth, d_j_date , car_no, car_model from ( select rownum rn, m.m_id as m_id, m.m_name as m_name , m.m_birth as m_birth, d.d_j_date as d_j_date , c.car_no as car_no, c.car_model as car_model from member m inner join driver d on m.m_id = d.d_id inner join car c on d.d_id = c.m_id inner join corp co on c.CAR_NO = co.CAR_NO where d_j_date is not null and rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}) where rn > (#{cri.pageNum} - 1) * #{cri.amount}

select m.m_id, m.m_name,m.m_profile ,m.m_birth, d.d_license_no, d.d_j_date, d.d_acnum, c.car_no, c.car_model from member m inner join driver d on m.m_id = d.d_id inner join car c on d.d_id = c.m_id inner join corp co on c.CAR_NO = co.CAR_NO where d.d_id = #{d_id}

select together, D_ID, DP_ID, ALL_FARE, START_PLACE, FINISH_PLACE, START_TIME, END_TIME from (select CASE WHEN substr(d.dp_id,19) = 1 THEN '일반' WHEN substr(d.dp_id,19) >= 2 THEN '동승' END together, rownum rn, d.d_id, d.dp_id, d.ALL_FARE, d.START_PLACE, d.FINISH_PLACE, d.START_TIME, d.END_TIME from DISPATCH d join member m on d.d_id = m.m_id and rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}) where rn > (#{cri.pageNum} - 1) * #{cri.amount} and d_id = #{d_id}
select count(CASE WHEN re_driver = 0 THEN 1 END) like_cnt from attend where dp_id in (select dp_id from dispatch where d_id = #{d_id})
select count(CASE WHEN re_driver = 1 THEN 1 END) hate_cnt from attend where dp_id in (select dp_id from dispatch where d_id = #{d_id})
mapper.insert: insert into member(m_id, m_name, m_imei, m_birth, password, m_email) values (#{m_id}, #{m_name}, #{m_imei}, #{m_birth}, #{password}, #{m_email})
insert into driver(d_id, d_license_no, bank_company, d_acnum, d_regdate) values (#{d_id}, #{d_license_no}, #{bank_company}, #{d_acnum}, sysdate)
mapper.select: with review AS ( select dp_id, count(CASE WHEN re_driver = 0 THEN 1 END) AS like_cnt, count(CASE WHEN re_driver = 1 THEN 1 END) AS hate_cnt, listagg(m.m_name, '/') within group (order by m.m_name) name, listagg(a.RE_DRIVER_REASON, '/') within group (order by m.m_name) reason from attend a join member m on a.M_ID = m.M_ID where a.dp_id in (select dp_id from dispatch where d_id = #{d_id}) group by a.DP_ID ) select CASE WHEN substr(d.dp_id,19) = 1 THEN '일반' WHEN substr(d.dp_id,19) >= 2 THEN '동승' END together, d.d_id, d.dp_id, d.ALL_FARE, d.START_PLACE, d.FINISH_PLACE, d.START_TIME, d.END_TIME, r.name, r.reason, r.like_cnt, r.hate_cnt from DISPATCH d join review r on d.DP_ID = r.DP_ID

with fare as ( select d_id, sum(all_fare) as all_fare, sum(CASE WHEN end_time between TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') and LAST_DAY(SYSDATE) THEN all_fare END) AS month_fare, count(CASE WHEN substr(dp_id, 19) = 0 THEN 1 END) AS to_cnt, count(CASE WHEN substr(dp_id, 19) <= 1 THEN 1 END) AS no_cnt from dispatch group by d_id ) select d.d_id, m.m_name, substr(m_id,3,11) phone, m.m_email, m.m_birth, d.d_acnum, d.d_j_date, d.bank_company, f.to_cnt, f.no_cnt, f.all_fare, f.month_fare, CASE WHEN substr(m.m_id,2,1) IN (1,3) THEN '남자' WHEN substr(m.m_id,2,1) IN (2,4) THEN '여자' END as gender from member m inner join driver d on m.m_id = d.D_ID full outer join fare f on f.d_id = d.d_id where d.d_id = #{d_id}

select a.dp_id, m.m_id, m.m_name, concat(to_char(m.m_birth,'rr'), '년생') age, CASE WHEN substr(m.m_id,2,1) IN (1,3) THEN '남' WHEN substr(m.m_id,2,1) IN (2,4) THEN '여' END as gender, a.seat from member m join attend a on m.m_id = a.m_id where a.dp_id = #{dp_id}
mapper.delete: delete from ban where d_id = #{d_id} and m_id = #{m_id}
mapper.select: select m.M_STATUS, m.M_PROFILE, m.m_name, c.*, co.corp_code from member m join car c on m.M_ID = c.M_ID join CORP co on c.CAR_NO = co.CAR_NO where co.D_ID = #{d_id}
